description: [Twister](http://twister.net.co) is a secure and fully-decentralized P2P microblogging platform based on concepts and code from Bitcoin and Libtorrent (as described in [this whitepaper](http://arxiv.org/abs/1312.7152)). Feel free to contribute to its [core service](https://github.com/miguelfreitas/twister-core) or [HTML UI](https://github.com/miguelfreitas/twister-html)!
ohloh_description: CudaMiner patched to generate twister's blocks
name: Twister
